fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Business and Industry, Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Food Safety
eu_initiatives:
Seeking opportunities in capacity as sector expert 
 
Evaluation of H2020 proposals
goals__remit: Consulting activity in field of biotechnology and chemical manufacture.  Supply of services relating to  all processes and activities in  project management.  Technology Translation , especially at interface between biology and chemical sciences. Proposal writing. Monitoring of  projects on behalf of sponsors. Dissemination of project achievements and management of exploitable outcomes on behalf of project participants
relevant_communication:
Recent EU project participation included Kyrobio 289646 (coordinator and project manager), Bioox 613849(project manager and wp leader), and SNOOPY 313110 (project manager) 
Various publications in books journal trade mags and new letters  reflect my technical experience as a  microbiologist and as a technology translator  example publications include Biocatalyst Identification and Scale-Up: Molecular Biology for Chemists    2009-01-01    Wiley Practical Methods for Biocatalysis and Biotransformations. John Whittall, Peter Sutton eds, Pages: 83–11Biocatalyst Identification and Scale-Up: Molecular Biology for Chemists    2009-01-01    Wiley Practical Methods for Biocatalysis and Biotransformations. John Whittall, Peter Sutton 20095, 2009 ,  
 & The glycerol challenge    2007-06-01    SPECIALITY CHEMICALS MAGAZINE, 2007, VOL 27; NUMB 6, pages 42-43    . In addition I have appeared on discussion panels at  international events and made oral and poster presentations at commercial  networking and scientific events  representing  projects.
